title: Claude Code Settings Schema
description: JSON Schema for Claude Code settings.json configuration file. Based on: settings

apiKeyHelper.description: Path to a custom script that outputs an API key. The script should print the API key to stdout and exit with code 0 for success.

cleanupPeriodDays.description: Number of days to retain chat transcripts before automatic cleanup. Set to 0 to disable cleanup.

env.description: Environment variables to apply to sessions. These are merged with the current environment.

includeCoAuthoredBy.description: Include 'Co-authored-by: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>' in git commits and pull requests.

permissions.description: Permission rules for tool usage and file access.

hooks.description: Custom commands to run before or after tool usage.

model.description: Override the default model for sessions. Examples: 'claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022', 'claude-3-5-haiku-20241022'.

forceLoginMethod.description: Force a specific login method. 'claudeai' uses Claude.ai account, 'console' uses Anthropic Console API key.

enableAllProjectMcpServers.description: Auto-accept all MCP servers defined in the project's .mcp.json file.

enabledMcpjsonServers.description: List of specific MCP server names to approve from .mcp.json files.

disabledMcpjsonServers.description: List of specific MCP server names to reject from .mcp.json files.

otelHeadersHelper.description: Path to a script that outputs OpenTelemetry headers. Script should print headers in 'Name: Value' format, one per line.
